courses.title: Welcome
courses.description: Getting started with the Yellow Belt DevOps Dojo: understanding the back story, setting up your environment.

courses.title: Leading Change
courses.description: Learn about the importance of Leading Change in DevOps Transformations. A large factor in the success of DevOps transformations is driven by the organization's ability to empower people to lead change at the different levels in the organization.

courses.title: Version Control
courses.description: Version control is a system that records changes to a file or set of files over time so that you can recall specific versions later.

courses.title: Continuous Integration
courses.description: The process of merging work from all the developers in a team into the master branch as and when required.

courses.title: Value Stream Mapping
courses.description: Optimize your processes for value delivery and speed.

courses.title: DevOps Kaizen
courses.description: Learn how DevOps Kaizen events can be used to help you and your team continuously improve your process.

courses.title: Test Driven Development
courses.description: The flow by which one start to create tests first, verify that they fail, then code to make them pass.

courses.title: Continuous Testing
courses.description: Continuous Testing is the process of executing automated tests from a continuous integration/delivery pipeline to get feedback on quality of the software being built as rapidly as possible.

courses.title: Shift Left on Security
courses.description: Security must be considered from the beginning and continuously assessed.

courses.title: Post Incident Practices
courses.description: Learn how to establish a Safety Culture, conduct blameless post-mortems and create a “code of conduct” to help your team manage incidents in all phases of their life cycle

courses.title: Assessment
courses.description: This module contains a small exam. Pass the exam get the belt. Answers to all the questions are in the other modules.
